tragedy.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death
tragedy.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
tragedy.translation[0].definitions[1].de: something that seems very sad and unnecessary because something will be wasted, lost, or harmed
tragedy.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: It’s a tragedy to see so much talent going to waste.
tragedy.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a serious play or book that ends sadly, especially with the death of the main character
tragedy.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: ‘Hamlet’ is one of Shakespeare’s best known tragedies.
tragedy.translation[0].definitions[3].de: this type of play or book
